remarks: Change variable numbers in a Diophantine class abstraction using explicit substitution.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Oct-2014.)
statement:
rabrenfdioph $p |- ( ( B e. NN0 /\ F : ( 1 ... A ) --> ( 1 ... B ) /\ { a e. ( NN0 ^m ( 1 ... A ) ) | ph } e. ( Dioph ` A ) ) -> { b e. ( NN0 ^m ( 1 ... B ) ) | [. ( b o. F ) / a ]. ph } e. ( Dioph ` B ) ) $.
$d A a b $.
$d B a b $.
$d F a b $.
$d b ph $.
